title: Suspension of college funding over “Israelism” film

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Virginia Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. Any communications to or from any member of the Board of Supervisors concerning “Israelism” or the funding of Piedmont Virginia Community College. 

2. Any communications to or from any member of the Board of Supervisors which mention Israelism, Israel, Palestine, Israeli, Jewish, Palestinian, antisemitism, anti-semitism, antisemitic, anti-Semitic, college, colleges, “Piedmont Virginia”, or PVCC. This category is limited to records generated on or after October 1, 2023.

Please note that this request seeks public records wherever they may be found, including on devices or networks owned or operated by private parties. For example, if an employee uses a personal cell phone or social media account to conduct public business, records created, maintained, or held on the phone or account are public records subject to this request.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Tom Nash, a citizen of Virginia, in coordination with Adam Steinbaugh.

title: Cancellation of Abel Garcia appearance at Victory Forest Community Center

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. Any communications to or from any employee of the Parks and Recreation Department concerning the proposed appearance of Abel Garcia at the Victory Forest Community Center (including any communications concerning the application, planning, or cancellation of the appearance). 

2. Any communications to or from Richard Zavala concerning Abel Garcia or Latinos United for Conservative Action (LUCA) since January 1, 2024. 

3. A copy of any policy cited in the cancellation of Garcia’s planned appearance, as well as any version of that policy as revised since January 1, 2024.

Please note that this request seeks public records wherever they may be found, including on devices or networks owned or operated by private parties. For example, if an employee uses a personal cell phone or social media account to conduct public business, records created, maintained, or held on the phone or account are public records subject to this request.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Adam Steinbaugh
